price: I povratite se Gospodaru svom i pokorite Mu se prije nego što vam kazna dođe – poslije vam niko neće u pomoć priskočiti.
arabic: وَأَنِيبُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ وَأَسۡلِمُواْ لَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَكُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-anībū ilā rabbikum wa-aslimū lahu min qabli an yatiyakumu al-ʿadhābu thumma lā tunṣarūna
